website_summaries.verdict: The Black & Decker Purify air fryer is a perfect for frugal shoppers, but you'll need something bigger to feed a crowd.
pros: The Black & Decker Purifry gives food a deep-fried taste with little to no oil
It's relatively affordable and simple to use
It's compact compared to other air fryers
cons: It doesn't cook a lot of food at once
It lacks an automatic stirring arm
Labels for its temperature settings are small and tough to read

customer_reviews.title: Convection ovens are meant to lay everything out on a flat surface for even cooking and you can not do that with small air fryer
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time. This is a crappy air fryer. You can only make maybe 4 onion rings at a time. Convection ovens are meant to lay everything out on a flat surface for even cooking and you can not do that with small air fryers like this. Everything you cook just sticks together even if you shake it half way through like the instructions say. Your much better off just frying your items in veggie oil (who said frying in veggie oil or olive oil is bad anyway?) and grill your other items in a George Foreman grill or BBQ if worried about fat.
customer_reviews.author: Akira

customer_reviews.title: Returning without ever using. Dial control lettering is so ...
customer_reviews.text: Returning without ever using. Dial control lettering is so tiny that cannot even be read with a magnifying glass... totally unusable!
customer_reviews.author: Jerre

customer_reviews.title: It was love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: It was love at first sight, and then not even a month of using it maybe twice a week, the plastic cracked on bottom of tray and couldn't insert into unit. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the fan makes a horrible, loud sound of metal scraping on metal
customer_reviews.text: This product was defective. After turning on the timer, the fan makes a horrible, loud sound of metal scraping on metal. No tinkering with it would make it stop, and we were very motivated to do so. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen LB

customer_reviews.title: #AwesomSauce
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing several times a week, you can throw just about anything in there & walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Kdiddle

customer_reviews.title: Frech fries were okay but not good.
customer_reviews.text: This was not at all what I expected. Tried to cook frozen breaded squash and it just stuck together in a clump. Frech fries were okay but not good.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah atkins

customer_reviews.title: Used! So disgusted
customer_reviews.text: I am so grossed out at the moment! I just opened the box and not only was it damaged (cracked on the side) but someone had used it and then returned it! I went to wash the pan out and there we crumbs of old food in the bottom. I am so disappointed right now! I am going to buy this from a brick and mortar store.
customer_reviews.author: l.b.

customer_reviews.title: Why does Amazon recommend?
customer_reviews.text: Works great with chicken parts or chops that have a little fat on them. Brown's meat nicely. Not as well with very lean meats which tend to not brown as well. Kind of expected a few more recipes to come with it. Can't live on French fries alone. It is very loud. I wash the unit thoroughly before using and although I have used it several times now washing in between there is still a strange odor during operation. The odor has not affected the taste of my food. Don't hate it enough to bother sending it back and will continue to use it but if I get a little extra money I'll probably try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: History Buff

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Better than restaurant quality pomme frites! No guilt treats -- easy to operate and super easy to clean. Have been using for a few weeks now, keep finding new things to try (no battered items though)...but cooks evenly and fast.
customer_reviews.author: looking4stuff

customer_reviews.title: One of the best decisions that ever made was to purchase this Air ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the best decisions that ever made was to purchase this Air Fryer. I waited and thought and price shopped for months until I finally understood from reading how to get the most use from this fryer. I can honestly say that I have not had my oven on in weeks and we totally like the texture of the many things we have placed in the fryer. A great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Pinterest Lady

customer_reviews.title: Ugh!
customer_reviews.text: Let's see! Cooking cycle time ding (sound) not working. Cooking temperature settings numbers almost unreadable because they are so small. Basket divider too small for the basket. Lame directions. Minimal instructions for food cooking times. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THIS ONE. YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This smelled and you couldn’t even read the tempurature or time because the print was so tiny. I returned it and bought the Philips, it’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Westemeier

customer_reviews.title: For a starter -- these make perfect French fries!
customer_reviews.text: We are eating french fries again, and the big difference is that they are now healthy. I will let it warm up for maybe 2 minutes, throw the cut potatoes in for 20 minutes on high, shake them up once half way through and we consistently end up with PERFECT french fries. You can spice them up however you like (garlic powder, salt, spicey) - or not at all. I've made potato chips also.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We Love ours! French fries, egg rolls and burritos everything we have tried is amazing not soaked in oil!
customer_reviews.author: far off

customer_reviews.title: This air fryer is really awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is really awesome. Pros: Great value - You'll find the Philips fryer is over-priced for nothing while being not so easy to clean.. Easy to clean - Takes a minute or two to wash. Automatically stops after the set time, with a bell ring. Have been using for six months and no issues. Big enough - Good enough for a 2-4 people family. Size could be a disadvantage too, but bigger the size nicer it fries! Cons- Takes too much space to keep - it is bigger than it appears to be. However, I think this is an issue for all air fryers out there, except you buy a small one intentionally.
customer_reviews.author: Nivethan

customer_reviews.title: Love it for making healthy chicken wings
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this particular brand because based on other reviews the company stands behind their product. We bought it for making chicken wings & it is perfect, it cooks about 8 at a time. No oil needed, they turn out perfect. 350 degrees for 25 minutes shaking them every 5 minutes. These are dry rub & we did some in franks hot sauce as well
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Straughan

customer_reviews.title: The pot did not fried any food, so I ...
customer_reviews.text: The pot did not fried any food, so I reviewed some videos in youtube and realised its fan was not working. The pot came in a sealed box, but it was damaged. I did not want to expend my money in a return, because I live in Colombia, so I decided to repair it myself. While I was opening it i noticed some screws were worn, so it is clear that the product had already been opened or repaired
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: After a year and a half,  food still tastes weird.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year and a half. It still makes my food taste weird! Takes up way too much room on the counter, it's too loud, and the food doesn't come out well. So I never really use it anymore. I wish I had got a nicer one to begin with bc I feel bad donating this. I just don't use it or want it enough to justify the space it takes up.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T

customer_reviews.title: Basket issue
customer_reviews.text: The basket will not stay fastened inside the pan when I shake it to stir the fries, chicken strips, etc. So the hot food ends up all over my hands and arms, countertop and floor. This air fryer is now in the trash. Too unsafe to even give to GoodWill. Very poor design. I do not recommend this product. There is great danger that you will get burned from the hot food.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the prior reviews before purchasing this item. I followed one of the suggestions to plug in and let the newness burn off! I did that and everything was good. I love this Air Fryer and so does my husband. Fried foods is something he is not suppose to have. So, I do French Fries and Chicken and he loves it!! I bought a cookbook so that I can explore more dishes. Happy with the results!!
customer_reviews.author: MadiMae

customer_reviews.title: What did I do before I had this????
customer_reviews.text: Last night I "fried" a chicken leg quarter. It came out great and all the grease from it was in the bottom basket. I bought it thinking fries, and not realizing it can do so much more. Great for fish, pork chops, and on and on. I read about problems people are having with OTHER air fryers: coating peeing off. baskets coming aprt. This brand is very well made, and I can't see myself having any of the problems I've seen mentioned about OTHER AF's with my Black and Decker. Beofre I understood all it can do , it never occured to me that I would wish for a bigger one. Wish they made a big brother version.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for mothers day as she had talked about wanting one for ages. So glad I did. She loves it and we use it frequently. It doesn't make things as crispy as an oil fryer but it is much better than using a regular oven. It cooks most things within 10-15 minutes that would take a regular oven 20-30, not even accounting for preheating. Anyone who is on the fence about an airfryer should give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jutting

customer_reviews.title: Not the best air fryer on the market
customer_reviews.text: This Black & Decker unit works well enough for the basics, like French fries or onion rings, but there are no accessories for it like there are with other brands. That means that when doing, say, chicken wings, the tops will be nice and crisp, but the bottom of the wings will be soggy. Food like chicken or meat needs to be cooked on a rack in a air fryer, and unfortunately that's not possible with this model. I returned mine as soon as I realized my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Bocaboy

customer_reviews.title: Very good Air Fryer...with a couple of faults.
customer_reviews.text: Actually this is a very good air fryer. I have tried several different recipes and all have turned out great. Chicken legs are my favorite! Clean up is a breeze but the dial settings printed on the unit is small and for some might be hard to see...like me. I would give it 5 stars but the unit is a bit noisy. I have not experienced any other air fryer so i really do not know if this fryer is actually "noisy". I'm glad i purchased this product and i would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: seahawker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer was recommended to me by my brother and when it went on sale, I hopped on! It was exciting at first and we use it regularly, but in the past month, it has sounded like a tornado/hurricane is going on inside. I have jiggled it and still no dice. We live in a shared building so I feel uncomfortable using it early morning and late night. I am disappointed to say the least since I bought this just two months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Anon1

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Love the air fryer. Easy to operate, does a great job, clean up much easier than a toaster or convection oven. Only issue I have with it is the size of the numbering on the temperature and time dials. Time dial numbering is very small and very little contrast to background but can see it. The numbering on the temperature dial is so incredibly small p, also with little contrast, that I have to use a small magnifying glass to see read it. I do wear glasses but vision is good with them.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Platt

customer_reviews.title: Not like air fryers on TV. No recipes included
customer_reviews.text: Temperatures are hard to read, and it is not versatile. Best for onion rings and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob B

customer_reviews.title: Main appliance in our house now! A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Wife was a skeptic when I brought this, but now swears by the versatility of the air fryer. Mozzarella sticks, fisk sticks, leftover chicken wings, lamb chops, fries, dumplings, etc.. have been through this machine and it keeps on trucking without any problems. Plus you no hot popping oil to deal with and "healthier" cooking. We have converted at least 6 other family friends to getting one and they all tell us how awesome it is.
customer_reviews.author: Tangy

customer_reviews.title: Love My New B&D Air Fryer!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Everything I've tried came out great! I bought the recipe book by Sandy Fairfield which is specifically for the Black and Decker. We've done pork chops, fresh potato french fries, chicken drumsticks, donuts from Pillsbury Grands, frozen hashbrown patties from Ore-Ida, salmon filets and much more. Love love love this new fat free way of cooking! The only thing I would ask is that B&D make the numbers on the degree dial big enough to read. These old eyes need BIG. Otherwise it works just like, if not better, than many of my friends' other brands of air fryers.
customer_reviews.author: SEWSCRAPPY

customer_reviews.title: We use it all the time and love it. Was disappointed that the 'cooking time for ...
customer_reviews.text: We use it all the time and love it. Was disappointed that the 'cooking time for specific meats, etc." was minimal and was mostly for frozen foods - we eat whole foods and a healthy diet - that is why we purchased the Air Fryer - and they give times for frozen stuff. So it has been a process to know how long to cook trout as apposed to cod; or steak and other foods not listed. I now have my own "cooking time list". They could have done better wth that.
customer_reviews.author: Maril T

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this frier. It does a great job on frozen fries and onion rings. Wings are a little more difficult. I have not perfected cooking them yet. So far they are not crispy enough for me and they leave a lot of residue in the bottom of the frier. I am not saying it can't be done. I'm still experimenting . I have no trouble using this frier. If I could change one thing I would make a frying pan larger. It makes enough for one, maybe two people.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R. Hudale

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by this small machine
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was disappointed. It felt cheap as I unpacked it but let me tell you... it does a great job. My first batch of chicken thighs were wonderful! Skin was nice and crisp. Brussel sproutd were my next batch and even tastier. Easy to use however, the numbers on the dial are extremely small and hard to read. Great for a couple or small family. Impressed with end results
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, requires a little hack
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I had to add a cut washer to hold the handle. Can't believe the manufacturer didn't notice it but every time you shake it to move the food the handle would get loose. The numbers on the timer qnd temp are not too easy to see too. If I could come back id get one with a digital timer. Temp doesnt need to be changed often... I kept it on max since day one. Cooks great thought
customer_reviews.author: 50fit

customer_reviews.title: Use frequently.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Once you get the timing down for your most frequently cooked foods this unit works flawlessly. Used mostly for frozen foods, fries, baked potato, tater tots, chicken breasts and such like. Hamburgers are a little messy. I line the container under the basket with foil for easier clean-up. Works fast, fan reasonably quiet, easy to use. Well insulated, outside and bottom remains safely warm even after 30 minutes of max heat running. Remember to not set the tray down on any surface that could be damaged by heat. Have used weekly for almost two years. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use...
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is worth it's weight in gold. Everything I have tried has come out perfect. As to the complaints about the small print on it, after using it a few times I know where to set it and don't look at that anymore anyhow!
customer_reviews.author: Halfton57

customer_reviews.title: He was quite happy with it
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my son in law for his birthday. He said he used it for baked fish. he rolled the fish in corn meal and it came out crispy. He said it didn't take up too much room on his counter. He didn't keep it out on the counter tho. He was quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Works great !
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is it’s small, maybe four chicken legs at a time, if they make a bigger one, I would get it next time. I recommend it for 2 people the most, cooks really fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Rich S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: I use this unit daiy. The two screws holding the handle to the basket have to be tightened each time or the basket will rest on the floor of the enclosure and won't circulate the air at the bottom of the food. I wore the screws out and had to replace the nuts and screws. Get an extra 1/8" screws so you can put a lock washer on each screw. Works better. Makes great food. The numbers on the timer are too small and they washed off after a couple of cleanings. I got the hang of it and use my kitchen timer instead. Amazon does not sell a replacement basket for this brand/model.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother in law and she loves it! She loves how easy to use and quick it is!
customer_reviews.author: Babyytop

customer_reviews.title: Love how everything comes out, especially french fries
customer_reviews.text: If you borrow The Zeiss Telescope from The Griffith Park Observatory in California, you should be able to see the numbers on the dials of this Black & Decker Air Fryer. We cook just about anything in this fryer. Love how everything comes out, especially french fries. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Buick McKane

customer_reviews.title: did not hold up over time
customer_reviews.text: I really loved having this when we first bought it but over time the screws that hold the basket fell out and disappeared, and the labels on the timer and temperature knob have faded and are no longer visible. Not a big deal, but for $100 I expected better. Also I have been disappointed in that only breaded items and not battered items can be cooked in the air fryer - but that is not specific to black and decker, just a short coming of an air fryer vs deep fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Really Good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Air Fryer. I usually fix grilled chicken, and it turn out so very good. I put all sort of seasoning and no grease. I let skin on the chicken. After it cooked; skin gets so crispy that you can eat it, inside is so juicy. I do believe that taste is so much better than KFC or grocery store's chicken since meat is so tender and juicy. Really good!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Temp setting is too small to read
customer_reviews.text: Works Well, Temp setting is too small to read. Great value, works well, but should include a magnifying glass to read the temperature setting. I've seen the fine print on car sales bigger than that?? Did the design engineers use it in an average kitchen? Need bright lights to try and read the very small temperature display!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know how we lived without air fryer all these years. It’s great for reheating or cooking items fast. Clean up is fast with quick rinse on non-stick. Only improvement would be if there was a stand to separate foods like French fries to avoid having to cook multiple batches - but well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Joe44

customer_reviews.title: Fast cooking and yummy food.
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I wanted an air fryer, but I am living this appliance! I have made chicken wings that are done within 15-20 mins and taste great! Also made dried chickpeas and many other healthy snacks in just minutes and the are much cheaper than the store and in the flavors I choose.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad for Christmas and he's used it every day since. Perfect for one person - he cooks all his veggies, fish and meat in there. I was concerned about the learning curve but he had it up and running in no time and is figuring out how he likes things cooked all on his own. He says it's a breeze to clean. Can't say enough good things about it!
customer_reviews.author: ae

customer_reviews.title: Surprised how much I like it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean. A tiny bit noisy but not a problem. I’m amazed really how good things taste “fried” with no oil. Have used so far for chicken wings and frozen fries. Love not having hot oil popping all over the place doing it traditionally. Planning on trying out other foods in it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Ballard

customer_reviews.title: My most used appliance!
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the appliances I've bought, this air fryer is my most used. Super easy to use, just set the temp, put in food and set the timer. There are some recipes that have you add a little bit of oil but honestly it's not needed. I've used it to cook fries, tater tots, chicken nuggets, veggies, chicken(from fried to roasted) to fish. Everything comes out crispy, juicy(meat) and perfect. I rant and rave about my air fryer every chance i get and recommend getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis T

customer_reviews.title: Fine Choice
customer_reviews.text: Apart from the tiny, tiny numbers on the dials, this seems to be a decent little machine. Honestly I like it best for roast vegetables. Also good for chicken wings. Not as good as I hoped for frozen nuggets and such. They get crispy but a little tough. Size is not too bad on counter but still holds a decent amount.
customer_reviews.author: Guy in Philly

customer_reviews.title: Fast convenient and easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine- it’s the best- I use it constantly- originals it was a last minute Christmas gift for my husband- but I took it over and find myself using it almost every night- so much quicker than hearing the oven. Chicken wings, chicken nuggets frozen and homemade are crispy and delicious. Homemade sweet potato fries, roasted Brussel sprouts- roasted potatoes- OMG everything is so quick and easy and cleanup takes 3 min- everything is non stick. I made homemade tortilla chips by butting large tortillas into triangles, shook them in olive oil- so much better than the deep fried store bought. I would definitely recommend this to everyone-
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vitale

customer_reviews.title: Mal functioning!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product in February 2018 and have used just a few times. Since the beginning we were not very impressed with its performance as it took too long to cook properly. This weekend a friend invited us for dinner and prepared salmón using the same air fryer and in only 20 minutes it was ready. Then, that is when we realized that something is wrong with ours!! What can we do?
customer_reviews.author: Rene Puche

customer_reviews.title: ... gifts for health-conscious cooks and they were both very pleased with this unexpected gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these as gifts for health-conscious cooks and they were both very pleased with this unexpected gift. I read several reviews and this seemed the best "affordable" air fryer of SEVERAL. If it's anything like the other Black & Decker products I've purchased over the years, it will probably last a very long time. And thank you for the quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Quick

customer_reviews.title: Air fryers are great.
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is awesome! it is actually more like a small oven, so "fryer" is a bit of a misnomer. But it makes oven-bake fries, wings, taquitos, snacks, etc. crispy and delicious in half the time they would take in the oven. Lots of recipes available on the internet. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Gets a lot of use!
customer_reviews.text: We love this air fryer! Use it almost daily for everything from chicken nuggets to grilled cheese or even homemade air fried pickles! I recommend this to everyone (just wish I'd purchased a larger size for our family of 4).
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice appliance for those who like fried food.
customer_reviews.text: Great appliance for the kitchen, food cooks fast and evenly. Not quite as good as deep fried, but pretty close. You have to be careful not to overfill because the food won't cook quite right, and I've had mixed results with the basket divider. The basket is a little flimsy, but otherwise it is great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read temperature control.  A digital clock would be more useful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item based on the ratings. The temperature control is so small to read I need a flashlight and magnifying glass. The timer would be better if digital since many recipes say to cook in non 5 minute increments (I use a stove timer instead). I like the concept of this being a healthier alternative to frying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this air fryer at such a great deal by checking out Amazon Warehouse deals
customer_reviews.text: I got this air fryer at such a great deal by checking out Amazon Warehouse deals, it looks like it was a returned item, perfect condition. Trying out my first air fryer item, Cornish hens. Apparently if it's something you want to cook, pretty much it can go in the air fryer. I will be trying all kinds of easy recipes & will not save so much time. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: ketchumsgal

customer_reviews.title: Favorite New Toy
customer_reviews.text: My air fryer has been an inspiration to me. I have fixed foods differently; some good, some not so good. BUT last night I fixed chicken wings and fries. Both were delish. I will continue the experimentation; it's fun, believe it or not!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Baynar

customer_reviews.title: Temperature numbers are SUPER TINY!
customer_reviews.text: I would never buy this unit. The numbers that indicate the temperature are so incredible tiny! I don’t know what they were thinking. Unfortunately I didn’t use my air fryer soon enough and can’t return it. I never thought of this as being an issue! Seems logical to me that people need to be able to read what temperature they are about to cook at. I hardly ever write reviews but am hoping I might save someone else this frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great for leftovers!
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time. It is one of my favorite kitchen appliances. It’s super easy to use. I warm leftovers up in this air fryer. It doesn’t make your food soggy like the microwave and it’s way faster than the oven!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Small

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled that this was so easy to use, which is good, because it did NOT come with a manual. Super not thrilled about that. We have used this several times and found sometimes the food had a slightly "off" flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken after third use
customer_reviews.text: Product broke after third use. I barely even air fry anything aside from fries and steak, all less than 15 minutes in cook time. No heat is generated anymore despite temperature and timer settings. It says there is a reset button at the bottom but inserting a rod doesn't allow you to reset any button. It just hits a dead end. So sad this product failed me. I had a high regard for Black & Decker to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Quesada

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! I loved this air fryer, and have recommended it to all my friends, but I am very disappointed! My unit isn’t very old, but the basket keeps falling off! Most recipes call for shaking the food while cooking, but I can’t do that because the basket falls off and the food falls on the floor! Wish I could send it back but I’m guessing it is too old!
customer_reviews.author: Deanne G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and tasty results !
customer_reviews.text: I am loving the B and D Air fryer. I was skeptical at first but it is great. I am really enjoying trying new recipes. Lots online. So far so GREAT ! Cooked a 3lb. whole chicken in 45 minutes and it was brown on the outside, tender and juicy on the inside. Another plus, not having to turn on the oven and heating up the kitchen. And, no greasy mess on the stove or countertop. Clean up is a breeze. One thing I wish it had a rack instead of the separator.
customer_reviews.author: D. France

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product as far as I am concerned
customer_reviews.text: I received this product on the date said, however when I opened it it had pieces of black plastic on the bottom of the box. There was broken pieces in the bucket too. When I really looked the silver didn’t even fit together right! Made me think that I don’t need an Air Fryer. I thought that the name Black + Decker meant quality!
customer_reviews.author: lucille c carr

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: The best kitchen appliance I have ever owned. I expected it to take the place of a deep fryer. To my surprise, it has also taken the place of our microwave as well. It's used constantly by the whole family. Very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrybomb

customer_reviews.title: Best new invention
customer_reviews.text: I was a little slow at even hearing about air fryers. I love this machine. I make fried chicken, chex mix, hamburgers and i can even toast the bun. I love it because it cooks without the oil and it is so easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: do the tighten up....
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected but something to check is one of the screws\nuts that attach the handle to basket was apparently not tightened on mine and screw fell out into food after several uses. Easy fix in my case but I added lock washers to both screws to avoid this in future.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: MAKES GREAT FRIES
customer_reviews.text: THE AIR FRYER FRIES ARE SO MUCH BETTER THAN THOSE COOKED IN OIL. I SPRAY A LITTLE PAM, DUST WITH SEASON SALT AND THEY COME OUT GREAT EVERY TIME. YOU CAN COOK WITHOUT THE OIL BUT THEY TEND TO STICK TO THE BOTTOM OF THE PAN. THE DIALS ARE A LITTLE HARD TO READ BUT IT'S NO BIG DEAL. LOVE IT....
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: don't overfill
customer_reviews.text: I love this air fryer! It's a perfect size for a couple or single, but getting something larger if you have a family to feed or do multiple batches.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamom

customer_reviews.title: Its nice and sleek, inexpensive and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME. I should use it more often. Ive had it for about two months and it still works great. Keep in mind some items may have to be tweaked to be cooked to perfection, but overall I'm happy with this item. Its nice and sleek, inexpensive and convenient. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel C

customer_reviews.title: Best entry level Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: One of the best air fryers for beginner's and experienced cooks to master the genius of a counter top convection oven.The 2 litre cooking chamber is more than enough to make entrees and side dishes for 2-4 people with proper planning. Hand wash the base and basket in mild soapy water instead of putting them in the dishwasher.Also check out Meridth Lawrence's "Air Fry Genius" cook book. J
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: smallish capacity but I use it all the time. everything comes out crisp and no need for oil. Initially, I gave this product 5 stars for the reasons listed above but the handle falls off all the time. It is a pain to constantly have to put the little screws and cap back on and it is definitely a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: This holds enough for 1-2 people but it is a bit big and bulky - make sure you have the room for it, because it is a machine...It is not digital and the temperature numbers are near impossible to read due to how small they are.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE O.

customer_reviews.title: Can't read the temperature dial.
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my air fryer; however, I have to make a guess as to the temperature because I cannot read the teensy markings on it. Are they numbers? Are they just tick marks? I can't find my magnifying glass so I can't tell you what these silver markings on black are.
customer_reviews.author: Shakti

customer_reviews.title: Makes wonderful well browned sizzling brats!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it cleans! We took it to the Farmers Market to cook samples of brats and it was so nice not bring gallons of oil and trying not to spill grease. It was much more handy to use. At home, I make different things with it, including a grilled cheese sandwich and I just sprayed butter spray on both sides of bread first. We are really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mara Solberg

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this air fryer! I've already made kale chips, sweet potato fries, ground chicken burgers and can't wait to see what else I can make. Easy to use and all of this is done in 10 minutes or less! To clean them, I just wash out the basket and use a papertowel to clean out the bottom part. It's easy to clean - another plus!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kelley Urquhart

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Once I realized you need food on the parchment inserts before putting the basket in the machine, all went well, lol. It cooks fast and makes food crispy just like frying in oil, with way less oil. Love it. My fav so far is the chicken.
customer_reviews.author: sally henry

customer_reviews.title: So far it’s a bit
customer_reviews.text: My bachelor son requested this for Christmas and I get FaceTime every time he uses it. The fries are a guilty pleasure and very happy to remove most of the oil normally needed to fill his cravings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite gadget in the kitchen. You can cook just about anything you want in this and it All comes out DELICIOUS! My pork loin comes out so juice in the air fryer, I won't cook it any other way. And sweet potatoe fries...any fries, come out amazing in here.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Poor Product
customer_reviews.text: My first one had a basket that was not very sturdy and the bolts broke so they sent me another and the basket has broken again. The control buttons for the temperature are so small I can't read them so I just use the 400 degree. Also timer numbers fade away so I used a marker. This produce is not worth buying and I was disappointed at the workmanship. Thought Black and Decker was a good brand, NOT SO ON THIS PRODUCT. Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The only thing that stopped me from giving it 5 stars is the fact that I had to tighten the handle screws after 6 or 8 uses... doesn't bode well for durability/longevity...
customer_reviews.author: Scaht

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one Broke before even being one year old and both that I bought the screws for the baskets came off and into our food both times.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Label issues
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this product for a while now and its still going strong. The only complaint I have is the timer labels faded quick and the temperature settings label are extreme small.
customer_reviews.author: laorangers10

customer_reviews.title: no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother in law. She uses it very often. I never heard any complaints from her. I assume she likes it well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know what I was missing till I got one...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has one and talked us into it. I do like it, cooks quickly and easy to clean. Just a heads up though, when you open the box there is a metal plate wrapped in plastic , with no label. It is the divider for the food basket, it took me longer to figure that out than to set the machine up. Black+Decker label your parts..
customer_reviews.author: ardy

customer_reviews.title: Great machine easy and fast cooking for two people
customer_reviews.text: Just love this air fryer. Cook almost everything from vegetables to flank steak to chicken. Does a great job. The only drawback is the size of the lettering on the Diles otherwise product is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer  Joan

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use quality product.
customer_reviews.text: A really useful and simple to use product. Gets my meal prep for the week really easy. Nothing is soaked in grease, everything is nice and crispy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L. Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice for 2 people
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before purchasing and have been extremely pleased with this product. Only thing that has been a problem is that I have to continually tighten the screw on the basket. Otherwise, easy to use, easy to clean and perfect size for two people!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope you have perfect vision
customer_reviews.text: Be warned... if you don’t have perfect 20/20 vision (and even if you do) good luck reading the temperature dial. The numbers are ridiculously small. I have to have my husband or kids read it for me because I can’t see them. Huge flaw!! I have (with the assistance of my family) used it and I do like it, it cooked the food fast and it was delicious but I really shouldn’t have to have a family member read the settings for me.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moritz

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The pull out handle is difficult to work. I had to use a potholder to press against the fryer until I could jiggle the cook basket out. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and size issues
customer_reviews.text: So as others have said, knobs are impossible to read especially after use fades them. Capacity is fine for individual food but not for more than two family members. Also the handle comes loose frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Tool Happy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean. It’s small but I use it for one or two people. I have had mine for over a year. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I am taking off one star is because the mechanical timer is annoying and it’s hard to clean. Otherwise it works as advertised, I even reheat fast food fries in it!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin D

customer_reviews.title: Good for lowering calories
customer_reviews.text: I use it mostly to fake fry okra and jicama for lower calorie options, but it does a pretty good job and isn’t horrible to clean. These units are huge, but so are competitors- it comes with the territory.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: Big basket
customer_reviews.text: Use it multiple times a week. Will purchase again if it ever breaks. Big basket for lots of food
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, so far everything I have cooked in it taste good. It is large so storing it takes a bit of space.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Troutner

customer_reviews.title: It is a mini oven for one or two
customer_reviews.text: Love everything. Don’t stick to fries and nuggets I tried acorn squash with butter then drizzled with dab of maple syrup after cooking. May be best thing i have eaten
customer_reviews.author: Johnny R Harkey

customer_reviews.title: A great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the air fryer. I get perfect Tatar tots; I have cooked delicious breakfast sausage in it. I really like it because I can reheat fried chicken in it and it come out moist and delicious. The owners manual is a bit lacking other wise I would have given this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: GWDetroit

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed diabetic. My wife threw away my deep fryer. I was mad I love my wings. This product does an excellent job. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Carnahan

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER Purify 2-Liter Air Fryer, Black/Stainless Steel, HF110SBD
product_meta.description: Delicious fried food is finally guilt-free! The BLACK+DECKER PURIFRY 2-Liter Air Fryer cuts out the oil to give you crispy food without the added fat. A pair of powerful convection fans surrounds food with heated air to cook all of your favorite fried delights quickly and evenly. The variable temperature control ranges from 175-400°F and the 60-minute timer automatically shuts off the machine once cooking is complete. The 2-liter air-frying basket is perfect for 2-4, making it easy to air-fry up snacks or a main dish. Plus, the instruction manual includes recipes and tips for cooking all your favorites. The BLACK+DECKER PURIFRY is the revolutionary way to enjoy deliciously crispy fried food with all the flavor and none of the guilt!
feature_bullets: Dual Convection Fans - The exclusive cooking element combines heat with a powerful dual fan convection system to circulate hot air around food for fast, crispy results
2L Capacity - The 2-liter (about 8-cup) air-frying basket fits 2-4 servings of your favorite snacks and main dishes
Qucik and easy cleanup - The nonstick cooking surfaces release food without the need of cooking spray; plus, the air fryer basket and basket separator are dishwasher-safe

Guilt-Free Results - Circulating hot air adds a crispy touch to your favorite fried foods without drenching them in oil and the instruction manual includes tips on cooking times, temperatures, and quantities
Included Components: (1) Deep Fryer, (1) Dishwasher-Safe Basket

Variable Temperature Control and Indicator Lights - The temperature control ranges from 175-400°F; one indicator light shows when the unit is powered on, and the other turns off when the preheat temperature is reached. Dimensions : 12.625 x 12.625 x 14.500

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,142 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
